casebody.data:
No. —, Original.

Ex parte: In the Matter of Fidelity & Deposit Company of Maryland et al. April 24, 1922. Mr. Charles Markell, Mr. Edward Osgood Brown and Mr. Edwin J. Marshall for petitioners.

Motion for leave to defer reprinting previous record on application for certiorari granted. Motion for leave to file petition, for writ of mandamus herein denied.
